message.body: Great! Do I need a legal ID? I forgot my drivers license at Drew's this morning. I have my PennCard, for what that's worth.
Oh, and I forgot a towel. I'm so disorganized today.
I know you need an ID but not sure if it has to be a state ID... Let me check the website
So, you only need a photo ID BUT I just read that guest hours are only from 12- 3PM!
I should have looked at that before.
Haha, that's okay. They sound pretty strict about bringing guests which makes sense. I suppose we could try to go during my lunch hour sometime but that might be too hectic.
Are you going to Fiona's party tomorrow?
I’m so sorry! Yeah I imagine they get all kinds of people trying to get in there. If you get an extended break let’s try it
Yes! I’m going to stop by! Are you going?
Yes!! Drew and I plan to arrive around 8 PM. Let's try to catch each other at the party!!
Awesome. I’ll plan on getting there around then too!
You too! It’s cold as crap out there
